title: Change in momentum of object after applied force

content.prompt: A force of constant magnitude F and fixed direction acts on an object of mass m that is initially at rest. If the force acts for a time interval ∆t over a displacement ∆x , what is the magnitude of the resultant change in the linear momentum of the object?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
